unnormalised: Hey folks, thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Mumbai or maybe a cozy little house in Goa? Well, a home loan is probably on your mind! Navigating through all the schemes can be a bit like trying to find a rickshaw during rush hour!
normalised: Hey folks, thinking of finally buying that dream flat in Mumbai or maybe a cozy little house in Goa? Well, a home loan is probably on your mind! Navigating through all the schemes can be a bit like trying to find a rickshaw during rush hour!

unnormalised: So, what are the main home loan schemes doing the rounds these days? You’ve got your usual suspects like:
normalised: So, what are the main home loan schemes doing the rounds these days? You’ve got your usual suspects like:

unnormalised: *   **SBI Home Loan:** Old reliable, good rates, lots of branches. My cousin, Priya, got hers sanctioned in record time from the Andheri branch last month.
normalised: *   **S B I Home Loan:** Old reliable, good rates, lots of branches. My cousin, Priya, got hers sanctioned in record time from the Andheri branch last month.

unnormalised: *   **HDFC Home Loan:** Another big player, known for their good customer service. Heard they offer some attractive festive season deals around Diwali. Remember to check it around 20/10/2024.
normalised: *   **H D F C Home Loan:** Another big player, known for their good customer service. Heard they offer some attractive festive season deals around Diwali. Remember to check it around twentieth October two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: *   **ICICI Bank Home Loan:** They have some interesting options, especially for NRIs.
normalised: *   **I C I C I Bank Home Loan:** They have some interesting options, especially for N R I s.

unnormalised: *   **PM Awas Yojana:** If you're eligible, this scheme offers subsidies, which can seriously lighten the financial load. My uncle, Ramesh, benefitted from it in 2021 when he built his house in his village near Lucknow.
normalised: *   **P M Awas Yojana:** If you're eligible, this scheme offers subsidies, which can seriously lighten the financial load. My uncle, Ramesh, benefited from it in two thousand and twenty one when he built his house in his village near Lucknow.

unnormalised: Don’t just jump at the lowest advertised interest rate! Look at processing fees, prepayment charges, and everything in between. Also, check for loan insurance options – better safe than sorry.
normalised: Don’t just jump at the lowest advertised interest rate! Look at processing fees, prepayment charges, and everything in between. Also, check for loan insurance options – better safe than sorry.

unnormalised: Also, remember to shop around! Visit different banks, compare their offerings, and negotiate. Maybe you can get a slightly better deal. And don't forget your CIBIL score - keep it healthy. It's going to be the key when you apply for the home loan around 14:00 hrs.
normalised: Also, remember to shop around! Visit different banks, compare their offerings, and negotiate. Maybe you can get a slightly better deal. And don't forget your C I B I L score - keep it healthy. It's going to be the key when you apply for the home loan around two post meridiem.

unnormalised: Finally, always read the fine print before signing anything. Happy house hunting! You will get your dream house before 31/12/2024. Good luck!
normalised: Finally, always read the fine print before signing anything. Happy house hunting! You will get your dream house before thirty first December two thousand and twenty four. Good luck!
